Text: Do write a commet or two :-)

Thank you for reupping this game and for me it even worked without any compatibility mode :D 
However, even if i have the folder in its "original" place at C:Corsairs So that all the folders in the ini are the same. It doesn't find the video files. Should the folder really be called intro or?

Thank you for reupping this game and for me it even worked without any compatibility mode :D 
However, even if i have the folder in its "original" place at C:Corsairs So that all the folders in the ini are the same. It doesn't find the video files. Should the folder really be called intro or? Thanks from Sweden :3

Hi. Thanks for the comment.

There is some kind off problem with the program on startup, but i does not have any effect on the game, what so ever. I actualy dont know the problem there. I think it has something to do with the .dll file in the corsairs folder. I simply cant get the video files running.
I think it is some kind of codec problem.

Hi! Thank you for seeding this torrent! Though i have a problem... I did just what you said above and placed the folder "CORSAIRS" in c: and changed the compability of the .exe file to win95 and clicked setup. 
I then got the message:
!!!ERROR!!!
MEMORY
ERROR N째00010002 LINE:99 FILE:courmem.c.

What have i done wrong and how can I do it right? I really wanna play this awesome game...

Once again, thanks for seeding! :)

skvjovik

Just extract the rar file in c: and run the game in win95 mode. Worked fine for me.
When you say "run the game in win95 mode", do you mean to change the compability of the setup file to win 95 or something else? :)
There shoul not be a setup file in the download. Only a rar file called corsairs.rar. I think u have the fist upload i made. Try and download this one.
I can't save the game when a i am playing, how can i fix this?

my problem is that when i choose campaign to play..while the game is loading it crushes
how can i fix that?

I have the same problem as skvjovik. It keeps saying that there's an error... after extracting the game, i changed the compatibility for windows 95 but it doesn't work for me
help please !

I seem to be able to play the game, even tho i get a message error in the beginning, something about an intro video missing.

Anyway, the biggest problem is that it has no music! Which is one of the main reasons why I love this game. Is kinda boring playing it without the soundtrack.

I have all the sound effects, tho.

U know how can I fix it?

btw, thanks for sharing!
I can't save either, any idea why ? I'm on Windows 7 extracted the game on c: and running it in win95 mode.
